body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky
Sept 28, 1863
J & J M Harlan
Dear Sir

This introduces you to M W Sherrill of Louisville who has been so unfortunate as to be fined for using the license of his agent who was such as peddling. He asks your aid in procuring relief I trust you can do something for him. I authorize you to use my name to his petition to the Governor

J & J M Harlan
Frankfort
Ky
